name: Monster Buds
description:
Arrows: Move, Space: Interact, Z: Shovel, X: Axe, C: Fishing Rod, Shift: Map

Make friends, shake trees, trade items, fish, and more in the peaceful world of Monster Buds! You and a few friendly monsters have all made your homes in an idyllic meadow with ponds and the ocean just a short walk away! Monsters love it when you bring them fruit and fish, and will trade you something in return.

This game saves data automatically, so you can always come back and your stuff will be where you left it! Your planted saplings might have grown up too!

Fun things to do:

  • Build a path between all the houses!
  • Catch every type of fish (14 to find, not including cans and boots!)
  • Find a rare cubefruit and plant it for a cubefruit tree!
  • Build a fence around your house (or your neighbors! >:D)
